channel.title: Dclaws special

item.title: Dclaws special
item.dc:creator: @daved daved
item.description:
@daved wrote:

ok, so I have my things and my codes. i also have a special.java

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 { return 3000;

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 24) { specialAtk(true, 25, 252, 2068); dclaws = 3; DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; getHit(100); usingSpecial = true; }

[code]if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002
&& specialAmount > 24) {

					specialAtkNPC(true, 25, 252, 2068);
					DCdown = 4;
					DCDamg = true;
					dclaws = 3;
					npcDamage(8);
				}[/code]

Errors:

client.java:5595: cannot find symbol symbol : variable dclaws location: class client dclaws = 3; ^ client.java:5596: cannot find symbol symbol : variable DCdown location: class client DCdown = 4; ^ client.java:5597: cannot find symbol symbol : variable DCDamg location: class client DCDamg = true; ^ client.java:6665: cannot find symbol symbol : variable DCdown location: class client DCdown = 4; ^ client.java:6666: cannot find symbol symbol : variable DCDamg location: class client DCDamg = true; ^ client.java:6667: cannot find symbol symbol : variable dclaws location: class client dclaws = 3; ^

thanks

How should I declare the symbols that are missing?

Read full topic
